## cloneSSRElement variable

Clone SSR elements ignoring the top level Fragment

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
cloneSSRElement: (element: JSX.Element, transformChildElements: (children: JSX.Element | JSX.Element[], childrenProps: PlainObject) => JSX.Element | JSX.Element[]) => import("react").ReactElement<any, string | ((props: any) => import("react").ReactElement<any, any> | null) | (new (props: any) => import("react").Component<any, any, any>)>
```

## Remarks

A utility method for the SSR JSX
